App Name: Family Spots

Package Name: app.familyspots

Brief:

Family Spots is an app designed to simplify family connectivity and safety by leveraging real-time location-sharing technology. It enables family members to stay informed about each other's whereabouts through an intuitive and user-friendly interface, promoting peace of mind and enhanced security for all circle members.
